name: Snowboard (itch) (hsquared)
description:
Try to do as many flips as you can without crashing!  Then, try to stop after the finish line without going over the cliff!  Switches to two different slopes!

Twenty years of skiing, now I can finally flip without getting hurt! lol

Mouse clicks:
Left mouse click = Flip!
Right mouse click = Stop!
F5 = To refresh the browser (game)
Also, this may be played in the browser on an Android tablet by flipping with one finger counter-clockwise and stopping by pressing two fingers.

Also visit highcalgames.com for more games, including Kill The Climbers !
